products.title: Splash Moss Green Roller Blind
products.description: Splash moss green is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.
